overview: This is the official and comprehensive review of another enthralling season of the best tin top racing around.  The action-packed 2-disc package brings you drama from every single race, with all the vital passes and shocking smashes, plus informed commentary and interviews with the stars. As always, the official review features the best footage, including plenty from on-board the cars, and the most comprehensive coverage possible. Once again, the title battle went right down to the very last day as Seat's Jason Plato and Vauxhall's Fabrizio Giovanardi went head-to-head again. As well as the absorbing title battle, the review brings you the full story of amazing wins for the likes of Tom Chilton, Mat Jackson, Colin Turkington and more, plus the panel-denting smashes.
title: BTCC 2008 Review
